name: Kyoshiro's Soul
flavorText: Kyoshiro felt a great calm come over him after the battle at Xiansai. He closed his eyes and it felt like nothing changed at all.
flavorTextHtml: Kyoshiro felt a great calm come over him after the battle at Xiansai. He closed his eyes and it felt like nothing changed at all.

primary.textHtml: Increases Sweeping Wind Damage by [100 - 125]%

secondary.textHtml: Sweeping Wind gains 2 stacks every second it does not deal damage to any enemies. (Monk Only) 2
